name: Kupechestvo
description:
Kupechestvo is a board game with historical elements. You will embark on a journey to medieval Russia during the period of the unification of the Russian lands and the heyday of the Grand Duchy of Lithuania (13th - 16th centuries) and try on the role of a merchant striving for fame and wealth.

Key Features:

  • Interactive tutorial.

  • 6 Scenarios filled with historical events.

  • Battle against AI.

  • Multiplayer.

  • Replay value thanks to various resource combinations.

The official digital version of the board game Kupechestvo.
